title: Leading bar soap brands ranked by sales value in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014
summary: This is a bar chart representing Soap Bar Brand in the x axis and Sales in million GBP in the y axis.
The maximum Sales in million GBP 26.8 is found at Soap Bar Brand Dove and the minimum is found at Simple where Soap Bar Brand is 5.8.
The highest Soap Bar Brand Dove has 21.0 more Sales in million GBP than the lowest Soap Bar Brand Simple.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million GBP for 3 number of Soap Bar Brands.
The maximum Sales in million GBP 26.8 is found at Soap Bar Brand Dove and the minimum is found at Simple where Soap Bar Brand is 5.8.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Soap Bar Brand in the x axis and Sales in million GBP in the y axis.
The maximum Sales in million GBP 26.8 is found at Soap Bar Brand Dove and the minimum is found at Simple where Soap Bar Brand is 5.8.
The highest Soap Bar Brand Dove has 21.0 more Sales in million GBP than the lowest Soap Bar Brand Simple.
max_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Soap Bar Brand, and Sales in million GBP in each Soap Bar Brand on the y axis.
The maximum Sales in million GBP 26.8 is found at Soap Bar Brand Dove and the minimum is found at Simple where Soap Bar Brand is 5.8.
Second maximum Sales in million GBP is found at Soap Bar Brand Imperial Leather.
The Sales in million GBP of Soap Bar Brand Simple is 4.62% smaller than the maximum value at Dove.
Considered together, the average Sales in million GBP in all 3 Soap Bar Brands is roughly 14.57.
